Data display components (tables, cards, lists)

Introduced a new AI Agent Builder configuration in ai-agents.json, enabling the creation of AI agents based on user requirements. This includes a comprehensive system prompt, loading text switches, render components for user input, and preload routes for existing agents and form components. This enhancement aims to streamline the process of generating AI agents and ensure adherence to best practices in agent configuration.
Refactored AI agent validation logic in useAiBuilder to differentiate between AI agent and schema routes, ensuring proper validation of required fields for each type

MAJOR: Removed legacy application-variables.json and application-variables-defaults.ts files, migrating configuration into typed config modules and environment variables for clearer, safer configuration management.
Enhanced multiple components and hooks across the application to consume the new config structure, improving performance, maintainability, and clarity.
Added OrganizationSettings control in the header that exposes tenant and company selectors in a unified popover with tooltips, improving organization context visibility.
Improved schema and tenant fallback logic for API routes in non-demo/live modes, adding safer local fallbacks when backend schemas or tenants are unavailable.
Introduced ENABLE_BUILDER environment flag to centrally control access to /builder and all nested builder routes for safer production deployments.

Introduced a new AI agent configuration for the Routing Plan Analyzer, which analyzes Points of Interest (POIs) for optimal routing based on demand, risk, and visit constraints. This includes a comprehensive system prompt, loading messages, and a structured output format.
Updated ai-prompts.json to include user prompts and agent responses for the new agent, improving the overall functionality and user experience.
Introduced a new Graph Generator AI agent, enhancing the system's capability to analyze user prompts and generate comprehensive graph visualizations

Added new complex contamination scenario in ai-prompts.json for improved graph generation capabilities

Modified TodoEditDialog and TodoList components to improve user experience when adding and editing todos, including validation for required fields and better handling of new todos
Updated SystemPromptPreviewSheet to show complete system prompt including general system prompt, graph generation instructions, and markdown output rules for accurate preview

Introduced centralized API calling utilities for AI agents, enhancing error handling and response parsing

Updated CheckboxList, PickerInput, RadioGroup, Select, ToggleGroup components to support reference-based filtering, improving data handling and user experience

FORMULA ENGINE | Introduced formula field type in form schema, allowing for dynamic calculations within forms with support for formData, formSchema, pageData, userData, and reference aggregations
Updated all-schemas.json to include new formula fields for net price and total price calculations in quotation items and quotations schemas
Enhanced FormElementFactory to support rendering of formula fields with KaTeX mathematical notation visualization and calculation breakdowns
Modified form schema types to accommodate formula configurations including precision, format, and showEditor options, enhancing flexibility in form design
Implemented secure formula parser without eval() usage, supporting mathematical operations, variable resolution, and reference aggregations with dependency tracking
Added formula visualization with KaTeX rendering, showing field names and values in mathematical notation format for better calculation transparency
Implemented automatic refresh of formula calculations when referenced repeating section items are added or updated
Implemented centralized cookie and localStorage clearing functions for improved forced logout handling
Updated handleForceLogout to clear all auth-related cookies and localStorage keys, ensuring a more thorough logout process. This change enhances security and user experience during session management

Improved logging in form elements (CheckboxList, PickerInput, RadioGroup, Select, ToggleGroup) to handle empty targetSchema values and provide better debugging information in production. This change enhances data management and user experience by ensuring accurate schema handling and improved error tracking.

Fixed production issue where form elements with targetSchema or reference properties were not opening. Added defensive checks for targetSchema extraction with support for multiple property name variations and improved error handling.
Improved dynamic context handling in form elements (CheckboxList, PickerInput, Select) to ensure reactivity when formSchema or formData changes
Enhanced FormLifecycleManager to set initial form data immediately if available, improving user experience during form rendering
Updated SidebarNavigationMenu to ensure home button is always displayed and merged with menu items, enhancing navigation clarity

Improved handling of static and dynamic referenceEntityId in form elements (CheckboxList, PickerInput, RadioGroup, Select, ToggleGroup) to ensure accurate URL generation based on context readiness. This change enhances data management and user experience by providing more reliable source URLs in dynamic contexts
Updated reference filter builder to handle empty resolvedEntityId cases more gracefully, improving error handling and debugging capabilities
